fieldUpdates.description: It updates Track 609.1 for FS to Now.

fieldUpdates.description: It updates Track 609.1 for FS to Now.
fieldUpdates.name: Set Track 609.1 for ID to Now

fieldUpdates.description: It will update the 609.1 Status field to "Under Review"

fieldUpdates.description: It initially captures 609.1 Trigger Stamp and then tracks the time stamp of any action taken by FS Manager.
fieldUpdates.name: Update Track 609.1 for FS

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),"Prospecting"),"Prospecting", IF( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),"Qualification"),"Qualification", IF( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),"Needs Analysis"),"Needs Analysis", IF( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),"Value Proposition"),"Value Proposition", IF( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),"Id. Decision Makers"),"Id. Decision Makers", IF( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),"Perception Analysis"),"Perception Analysis", IF( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),"Negotiation/Review"),"Negotiation/Review", IF( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),"Suspect"),"Suspect", IF( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),"Prospect"),"Prospect", IF( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),"Project"),"Project", IF( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),"Inactive"), "Inactive", IF( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),"Closed Won"),"Closed Won", IF( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),"Closed Lost"),"Closed Lost", IF( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),"Cancelled"),"Cancelled", ""))))))))))))))
fieldUpdates.name: Previous Stage Update

fieldUpdates.description: Update Stage Date when the Opportunity Stage changes
fieldUpdates.name: Update Stage Date
updae OPS Planning South Status null
update OPS Planning North null Status
update null OPS Planning central status

rules.fullName: NSSales NPO Resubmission Stage Change update field

rules.description: It sends an email alert to the opportunity and approval owner if an opportunity is approved 30 days ago and still not closed
rules.formula: AND( OR(RecordType.DeveloperName ='NS_General_Opportunity',RecordType.DeveloperName ='Read_Only'), OR(ISPICKVAL(NSSales_NPO_Final_Decision__c, 'Approved as Requested'), ISPICKVAL(NSSales_NPO_Final_Decision__c, 'Approved with Conditions')), AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Cancelled')),NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Closed Won')),NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Closed Lost'))) )

rules.description: Update Opportunity Probability when Opportunity Stage is Inactive or Closed Won or Closed Lost or Cancelled
It notifies the ID approver if 609.1 Approval process is active and no action is taken within 14 days. It will keep firing on each 14th day untill approver takes necessary step.
It notifies the ID approver if 609.1 Approval process is active and no action is taken within 14 days. It will keep firing on each 14th day untill approver takes necessary step.
Update hidden field Previous Stage to be able to evaluate when Opportunity Stage changes
It stamps FS Manager Response Date whenever FS Manager Recommendation field is updated.
It stamps ID Manager Response Date whenever ID Manager Recommendation field is updated.
